title: What Is This New Devilry? (1U202)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Shadow
Culture:	Moria
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Condition
Game Text:	Search. To play, exert a [Moria] Orc. Plays to your support area. While the fellowship is at site 5 or higher, each companion's twilight cost is +2.
Lore:	”'This foe is beyond any of you! Run!'”
Rarity:	U
